Name: Evil Nun: The Broken Mask
About the game: Disclaimer: Play the free demo and if you like it, you can purchase the early access for a very low price and in the future you will get all the new content for free ! Welcome to Eagle Junior High School You have been selected to participate in a religious summer camp that promises to be the ideal place to make friends and spend the summer. As soon as you arrive to this place, you realize that it is a hoax. You are locked in a dilapidated school guarded by an evil nun. This is the Evil Nun! “Evil Nun: The Broken Mask” is a horror game in which you have to escape from Sister Madeline, a nun who punishes children with her gigantic hammer. You will have to escape from the school at all costs, although along the way you will discover that you are not the only child trapped. You will have to solve all kinds of puzzles and mysteries to complete the game and end this nightmare forever. Huge success in mobile! One of the most popular horror games for mobile devices comes to Steam completely redesigned with new puzzles, scenes and graphics that will make you live a horror adventure like never before. Play stealthily by hiding from the evil nun or dare to face her and start a persecution around the school shooting gumballs and activating all kinds of booby traps. Every match will be different. The nun's AI will surprise you by reaching every corner of the school. Get it this Halloween! The first version of this game will be available this Halloween. You can play for free and complete the first escape, although to advance further in the game you will have to make a one-time payment and this way you will unlock more content in the future when it's fully released. This game will be updated with more content and in the future that payment will be more expensive, so don't miss the chance. Go ahead and buy it as soon as possible!
